title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version, a bug has been observed where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor. This menu should allow users to add breakpoints and marks, among other options. However, the menu does not appear when expected.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
EB: When following the above steps in the Photon version, the expected popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
SR: Fix the issue causing the popup menu to not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor in the Photon version.
